settings.heading: About MOBY
settings.description: Redefining daily energy, strength, and clarity for everyone

settings.heading: Breaking Old Stereotypes
settings.text_1: MOBY exists to break old stereotypes around creatine, making energy, strength, and clarity accessible to everyone who wants to live and perform better every day.
settings.text_2: We're reframing creatine as a daily essential for those who care not just about strength, but also mental clarity, focus, and overall vitality. What was once a routine is now one simple motion.

settings.title: Simplicity
settings.description: One stick. One motion. No complexity, no mess—just effortless daily ritual.

settings.title: Science
settings.description: Every formula backed by research. Optimal 5g dose, pharmaceutical-grade purity.

settings.title: Quality
settings.description: Produced in Sweden with the highest European standards. Rigorously tested for purity.

settings.title: Accessibility
settings.description: Breaking stereotypes—creatine isn't just for athletes, it's for everyone.

settings.heading: Packed Yet Effortless
settings.quote: "MOBY is packed: concentrated, complete, and precise—a product built on complexity and science. Yet using it is effortless—easy, seamless, and naturally in rhythm with your life."
settings.subtext: It's not really about doing more—it's about moving lighter, with the energy to show up fully—in work, in movement, in life.

settings.heading: Quality You Can Trust
settings.description: Every MOBY product is manufactured in Sweden, adhering to the highest European quality and safety standards. We use only pharmaceutical-grade creatine monohydrate, rigorously tested for purity and potency.

settings.tagline: A simple stick. A complete life.
settings.heading: Balance, Strength & Clarity

settings.description: Science-backed clarity and strength. Effortless daily creatine for brain, body, and balance.
settings.newsletter_text: Science-backed insights. Product drops. Delivered monthly.
